hanzi-su-wiki:
洋

Значения

Океан; заморский; за рубежом

Мнемоника

  • Океан, где целые барашки 羊 воды 氵.

  • "Эта уставшая овца 羊 прибыла из-за рубежа."

океан; огромный; иностранный; серебряный доллар или монета

purpleculture_info:
Antonyms: 中
Pictophonetic: 羊 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:

太平洋 [ tài píng yáng ]: Pacific Ocean
西洋 [ xī yáng ]: the West (Europe and North America); countries of the Indian Ocean (traditional)
洋溢 [ yáng yì ]: brimming with; steeped in
大洋 [ dà yáng ]: ocean; (old) silver dollar

heisig_chinese_memo: This kanji refers to the waters of the Pasheephic ocean.
heisig_constituent: ocean, water, water droplets, water pistol, sheep
heisig_story: Water . . . sheep. Be sure to keep the stories and key word of this kanji distinct from those for sea. (Frame 500).
koohiiStory1: This kanji refers to the waters of the Pasheephic ocean.
koohiiStory2: Remember the story of Jason and the Argonauts from Greek myth? Jason travelled across oceans of water in order to recover the fleece of a certain sheep.
jp_example_words:
洋風(ようふう): western style
海洋(かいよう): ocean
東洋(とうよう): Orient
洋品店(ようひんてん): shop which handles Western-style apparel and accessories
西洋(せいよう): West, Western countries
洋服(ようふく): Western-style clothes
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic:
A sheep rides a tsunami in classic Western style. And by Western style I mean the sheep is dressed in a cowboy outfit and has put a saddle atop the tsunami wave to ride it. It’s a tsunami rodeo and this crazy sheep is riding that tsunami wave in classic Western style.
This kanji also means ocean, because presumably the people from the "West" who have "Western Style" came from across the ocean. They're the "Ocean People" in this sense. You'll want to be familiar with this meaning for vocab later on.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine how ridiculous a sheep would look all decked out in Western style cowboy gear. Now imagine it riding a tsunami wave as it screams, “Baa~ baa~ baa~!”
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: After a whole day of riding this tsunami, the sheep is hankerin’ for some Western style food. This sheep loves yogurt (よう). And its favorite flavor is Western style apple pie yogurt. America loves its apple pie and this sheep loves Western style apple pie flavored yogurt.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine yourself eating this Western style apple pie yogurt. It tastes just like apple pie only creamier and fruitier. Taste the sweet yogurt in your mouth as you imagine yourself scarfing some down.

Kanshudo_mnemonic: the sheep's (羊) water (氵) is an ocean
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: This kanji refers to the waters of the Pasheephic ocean.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " water " and " sheep ", it means many. "Erya·Shiguxia": "Foreign...many." Tang Yan Shigu "Kuang Miyi and Orthodox ‧Foreign": "Today, Shandong folks say that all are foreign."

" Foreign " can mean vastness and grandness. Han Sima Xiangru "Nanshu Father and Elder Mu": "It is said that China has the most benevolent, deyang and enpopular, and everything is inexhaustible."

" Foreign " also refers to the center of the sea. Also refers to the sea in general. Song Zhao Lingzhen's "Hou Mabulu" Volume 3: "Today it is said that the center of the sea is the ocean, and there are many places with water."

" Foreign " in modern Chinese also means foreign and foreign. "Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 3: "The big kang near the window is covered with scarlet Yang Feng."

" Foreign " is also the name of the ancient river. "Shuowen": "The water flows out of the high mountains of Qilinqu, and the northeast enters Juding. From the water, the sound of sheep.
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " water " and " sheep ", it means many.
humanum_full_description:
從「水」，「羊」聲，表示眾多。《爾雅‧釋詁下》：「洋……多也。」唐顏師古《匡謬正俗‧洋》：「今山東俗謂眾為洋。」

　　「洋」可表示廣大、盛大。漢司馬相如〈難蜀父老檄〉：「蓋聞中國有至仁焉，德洋恩普，物靡不得其所。」

　　「洋」也指指海之中心。亦泛指海域。宋趙令畤《侯鯖錄》卷三：「今謂海之中心為洋，亦水之眾多處。」

　　「洋」在近現代漢語中還表示外國的、來自外國的。《紅樓夢》第3回：「臨窗大炕上鋪着猩紅洋罽。」

　　「洋」也是古代河流之名。《說文》：「水，出齊臨朐高山，東北入鉅定。从水，羊聲。」

從「 水 」，「 羊 」聲，表示眾多。《爾雅‧釋詁下》：「洋……多也。」唐顏師古《匡謬正俗‧洋》：「今山東俗謂眾為洋。」 「 洋 」可表示廣大、盛大。漢司馬相如〈難蜀父老檄〉：「蓋聞中國有至仁焉，德洋恩普，物靡不得其所。」 「 洋 」也指指海之中心。亦泛指海域。宋趙令畤《侯鯖錄》卷三：「今謂海之中心為洋，亦水之眾多處。」 「 洋 」在近現代漢語中還表示外國的、來自外國的。《紅樓夢》第3回：「臨窗大炕上鋪着猩紅洋罽。」 「 洋 」也是古代河流之名。《說文》：「水，出齊臨朐高山，東北入鉅定。从水，羊聲。」
From the sound of " water" and " sheep", it means many. "Erya·Shiguxia": "Foreign...many." Tang Yan Shigu "Kuang Miyi and Orthodox ‧Foreign": "Today, Shandong folks say that all are foreign." " Foreign" can mean vastness and grandness. Han Sima Xiangru "Nanshu Father and Elder Mu": "It is said that China has the most benevolent, deyang and enpopular, and everything is inexhaustible." " Foreign" also refers to the center of the sea. Also refers to the sea in general. Song Zhao Lingzhen's "Hou Mabulu" Volume 3: "Today it is said that the center of the sea is the ocean, and there are many places with water." " Foreign" in modern Chinese also means foreign and foreign. "Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 3: "The big kang near the window is covered with scarlet Yang Feng." " Foreign" is also the name of the ancient river. "Shuowen": "The water flows out of the high mountains of Qilinqu, and the northeast enters Juding. From the water, the sound of sheep.

洋字的基本解释

洋
yáng
比海更大的水域：海洋。
广大，众多，丰盛：洋溢。洋洋。
指外国的，外国来的：洋人。洋货。洋为中用。
指现代化的（区别于“土”）：土洋结合。
银元：大洋。洋钱。
土中

Basic explanation of words
foreign
yáng
Larger waters than the sea: the ocean.
Vast, numerous, rich: overflowing. Yangyang.
Refers to foreigners, foreigners: foreigners. Foreign goods. Foreign is Chinese.
Refers to modern (different from "soil"): the combination of earth and foreign.

Source glyph
foreign
Name meaning
: Refers to numerous, vast, grand; also refers to the sea.
yáng, xiáng
I сущ.
1) океан; безбрежные воды; океанский, безбрежный
太平洋 Тихий океан
渡过洋 переплыть океан
德洋 океан (море) добродетели
2) заморские страны, заграница; заморский, заграничный, иноземный, иностранный; импортный
外洋 заграница; иностранный
洋枪洋炮 заграничные винтовки и заграничные пушки; иностранное оружие
洋土 иностранный и местный; импортный и отечественный (о товаре)
3) серебряная монета, серебро
小洋 разменная серебряная монета
美洋三元 три американских серебряных доллара
II собств.
1) геогр. (сокр. вм. 洋县) Янсянь (уезд в пров. Шэньси)
2) xiáng геогр. (сокр. вм. 洋水) Сяншуй (река в пров. Шэньси и Ганьсу)
3) Ян (фамилия)
III словообр.
присоединяется в качестве приставки к названию любого предмета иностранного образца или происхождения (особенно европейского)
洋针 булавка
洋伞 зонт
洋胰子 мыло
洋白菜 кочанная капуста
洋纸 бумага (для печати)
洋手巾 носовой платок
洋人 иностранец

洋

Значения

Океан; заморский; за рубежом

Мнемоника

  • Океан, где целые барашки 羊 воды 氵.

  • "Эта уставшая овца 羊 прибыла из-за рубежа."
Radicals: 氵, 羊  (tsunami, sheep)
Meaning Mnemonic
A sheep rides a tsunami in classic Western style. And by Western style I mean the sheep is dressed in a cowboy outfit and has put a saddle atop the tsunami wave to ride it. It’s a tsunami rodeo and this crazy sheep is riding that tsunami wave in classic Western style.
This kanji also means ocean, because presumably the people from the "West" who have "Western Style" came from across the ocean. They're the "Ocean People" in this sense. You'll want to be familiar with this meaning for vocab later on.
Imagine how ridiculous a sheep would look all decked out in Western style cowboy gear. Now imagine it riding a tsunami wave as it screams, “Baa~ baa~ baa~!”
Reading Mnemonic
After a whole day of riding this tsunami, the sheep is hankerin’ for some Western style food. This sheep loves yogurt (よう). And its favorite flavor is Western style apple pie yogurt. America loves its apple pie and this sheep loves Western style apple pie flavored yogurt.
Imagine yourself eating this Western style apple pie yogurt. It tastes just like apple pie only creamier and fruitier. Taste the sweet yogurt in your mouth as you imagine yourself scarfing some down.
